author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...OCTAVE MAINTAINING ITS INTENSITY AS IT DRIFTS NORTHEASTWARD...
summary: ...OCTAVE MAINTAINING ITS INTENSITY AS IT DRIFTS NORTHEASTWARD... As of 2:00 PM PDT Sun Oct 05 the center of Octave was located near 16.0, -123.3 with movement NE at 6 mph. The minimum central pressure was 987 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 80 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...OCTAVE MAINTAINING ITS INTENSITY AS IT DRIFTS NORTHEASTWARD... As of 2:00 PM PDT Sun Oct 05 the center of Octave was located near 16.0, -123.3 with movement NE at 6 mph. The minimum central pressure was 987 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 80 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Octave (EP5/EP152025)
